channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: a16z partner Kofi Ampadu to leave firm after TxO program pause
item.description: Ampadu's departure perhaps signals the end of the TxO chapter. The fund and program focused on supporting underserved founders by providing access to ...

item.title: A peek inside Physical Intelligence, the startup building Silicon Valley’s buzziest robot brains
item.description: If co-founder Lachy Groom has any doubts, he doesn’t show it. He’s working with people who've been working on this problem for decades and who believe...

item.title: Informant told FBI that Jeffrey Epstein had a ‘personal hacker’
item.description: The hacker allegedly developed zero-day exploits and offensive cyber tools and sold them to several countries, including an unnamed central African go...

item.title: Blue Origin pauses space tourism flights to focus on the moon
item.description: The company is trying to take advantage of President Donald Trump's desire to return astronauts to the lunar surface by the end of his term.

item.title: SpaceX’s IPO could open the floodgates — and secondaries are booming in the meantime
item.description: To unpack what SpaceX’s IPO chatter means, how private liquidity works before a debut, and what investors are looking for in today’s pre-IPO giants, w...

item.title: Instagram might soon let you remove yourself from someone’s Close Friends list
item.description: Since the feature's launch in 2018, users haven't been able to remove themselves from someone else's Close Friends list.

item.title: OnlyFans considering selling majority stake to Architect Capital
item.description: This isn't the first time in recent memory that OnlyFans has been in talks to sell off its business.

item.title: OpenClaw’s AI assistants are now building their own social network
item.description: The viral personal AI assistant formerly known as Clawdbot has a new shell — again. After briefly rebranding as Moltbot, it has now picked OpenClaw as...

item.title: 3 Great Heated Blanket Deals on My Favorite Affordable Models
item.description: Some of our favorite heated blankets are on sale (and might even arrive in time for you to use this weekend).

item.title: I Let Google’s ‘Auto Browse’ AI Agent Take Over Chrome. It Didn’t Quite Click
item.description: Auto Browse can shop for clothes, plan a trip, and buy tickets for you. Or at least, that’s the idea.
